properties.description: procfwk infant pipeline used to check when the processing pipeline called by the Child completes and passes the resulting status back to the metadata database.

activities.name: Execute Worker Pipeline
activities.description: The lowest level executor with the metadata framework to call existing processing pipelines within Data Factory. The function called will block processing and wait for an outcome.

activities.name: Get Pipeline Params
activities.description: Returns any parameters from metadata required for the processing pipeline being called. The output can be an empty string if no parameters are required.

activities.name: Log Pipeline Running
activities.description: Sets the current pipeline with a status of running within the current execution database table.

activities.name: Log Execute Function Activity Failure
activities.description: Handle true failures from calling out to the Azure Function and update the current execution table accordingly so a restart can occur.

activities.name: Update Run Id
activities.description: Provide the actual ADF run ID back to the current execution table for long term logging and alignment between the metadata other Azure monitoring tools.

activities.name: Check For Alerts
activities.description: Checks the properties tables and if any recipients in the database require alerts sending for the current pipeline ID.

activities.name: Send Alerts
activities.description:
True = alerts need sending.
False = do nothing.

ifTrueActivities.name: Get Email Parts
ifTrueActivities.description: Return all required content from the metadata database to send an email alerting using the procfwk. The lookup returns the exact content for the function body request.

ifTrueActivities.name: Call Email Sender
ifTrueActivities.description: Pass off email request to Utils Send Email pipeline.

activities.name: Wait Until Pipeline Completes
activities.description:
Loops until the Worker pipeline called completes.

Simple status:
- Running = new iteration.
- Done = break.

activities.name: Get Worker Pipeline Status
activities.description: Checks the status of a given processing pipeline and provides the value for the downstream framework activities to act upon.

activities.name: Wait If Running
activities.description:
True = Do nothing.
False = Wait, before the next iteration.

ifFalseActivities.name: Wait for Pipeline
ifFalseActivities.description: The processing pipeline is still running so Wait before checking its status again.

activities.name: Set Last Check DateTime
activities.description: Update the current execution table with a date time from when the Worker pipeline status was last checked as part of the Until iterations.

activities.name: Log Check Function Activity Failure
activities.description: Report to the current execution table that the framework pipeline activity has failed. This failure is outside of the scope of the framework and is probably related to a wider platform problem.

activities.name: Set Worker State
activities.description: Set the bool state of the Worker pipeline to be used by the Until and If expressions. True = Complete, False = Running.

activities.name: Set Pipeline Result
activities.description: Receives the outcome from the function execution for a given processing pipeline and updates the current execution table with different pipelines status values depending on the result (case).

activities.name: Pipeline Status Succeeded
activities.description: Updates the current execution table with a pipeline status of success if the function outcome is succeeded.

activities.name: Pipeline Status Failed
activities.description: Updates the current execution table with a pipeline status of failed if the function outcome is failed. Also blocks pipelines in the downstream execution stage.

activities.name: Get Worker Pipeline Error Details
activities.description: Get the activity error details for the run ID of the worker pipeline called. Returns an array of all errors.

activities.name: Log Error Details
activities.description: Parses pipeline error details and persists them to the metadata database error log table.

activities.name: Pipeline Status Cancelled
activities.description: Updates the current execution table with a pipeline status of cancelled if the function outcome is cancelled.

defaultActivities.name: Pipeline Status Unknown
defaultActivities.description: Updates the current execution table with a pipeline status of unknown if the function returns an unexpected outcome.

activities.name: Get Wait Duration
activities.description: Return wait duration in seconds from database properties table to be used during each Until iteration when the Worker pipeline is still running.

activities.name: Set Run Id
activities.description: Set local variable from activity output once for value reuse in downstream activities.

activities.name: Validate Pipeline
activities.description: Query the target data factory and establish if the provided worker pipeline name is valid.

dependsOn.activity: Capture Worker Core Details as an Array

activities.name: Is Target Worker Validate
activities.description:
True = the worker pipeline name is valid.
False = the worker pipeline name is invalid. Raise an exception.

ifFalseActivities.name: Throw Exception - Invalid Infant
ifFalseActivities.description: Throw an exception with details about the invalid worker pipeline name.

Message.value: @concat('Worker pipeline [',variables('WorkerCoreDetails')[0].pipelineName,'] is not valid in target Orchestrator [',variables('WorkerCoreDetails')[0].orchestratorName,']')

ifFalseActivities.name: Update Execution With Invalid Worker
ifFalseActivities.description: Update the current execution table with an informed status for the worker pipeline that couldn't be executed.

activities.name: Log Validate Function Activity Failure
activities.description: Handle true failures from calling out to the Azure Function and update the current execution table accordingly so a restart can occur.

activities.name: Log Pipeline Validating
activities.description: Sets the current pipeline with a status of validating within the current execution database table.

activities.name: Get Worker Core Details
activities.description: Return worker pipeline information for metadata database. Including target data factory, pipeline name and resource group. Return the SPN ID and Secret for the worker pipeline being executed. Called at this level as each pipeline can have a different SPN.

activities.name: Capture Worker Core Details as an Array
activities.description: Add all worker pipeline details to a local variable array that can be accessed by each function call requiring the values.

activities.name: Is Target Worker Validate
activities.description:

activities.name: Capture Worker Core Details as an Array
activities.description: Add all worker pipeline details to a local variable array that can be accessed by each function call requiring the values.

activities.name: Get Worker Pipeline Error Details_copy1
activities.description: Get the activity error details for the run ID of the worker pipeline called. Returns an array of all errors.

properties.description: For a given pipeline and optional batch name establish if a pipeline run is already in progress. Throw an exception if it it.

activities.name: Filter Running Pipelines
activities.description: Filter the pipeline runs results for pipelines that exclude the current triggered run and that are currently running (in progress or queued).

activities.name: Get Framework Orchestrator Details
activities.description: Using the metadata orchestrators return details about the resource running the framework pipelines.

activities.name: Get Query Run Days Value
activities.description: Using the metadata properties table return the run days value to provide the API request with a date range for pipeline executions.

activities.name: If Pipeline Is Running
activities.description:
If the running pipeline count is greater than or equal to one.
True = raise an exception.

ifTrueActivities.name: Throw Exception - Pipeline Running
ifTrueActivities.description: Using the utils pipeline raise an exception to stop the new trigger while a run is already in progress.

Message.value: @concat('Provided pipeline name (',pipeline().parameters.PipelineName,') still has a run in progress or queued given the query range parameters set in the properties table.')

activities.name: Get Execution Batch Status
activities.description: Using the metadata properties table return the flag to indicate if batch execution setting are enabled or disabled.

activities.name: If Using Batch Executions
activities.description:
True = batch executions are enabled.
False = batch execution are disabled.

ifFalseActivities.name: Set Run Count Without Batch
ifFalseActivities.description: Set the pipelines running count variable to be tested later.

ifTrueActivities.name: Filter for Batch Name
ifTrueActivities.description: Further filter the return pipeline runs for any running pipelines with the same batch name value.

ifTrueActivities.name: Set Run Count for Batch
ifTrueActivities.description: Set the resulting pipeline running count variable to be tested later.

activities.name: Set Subscription Id
activities.description: Set the subscription Id value to a local variable for use in various downstream activities.

activities.name: Set Resource Group Name
activities.description: Set the resource group name value to a local variable for use in various downstream activities.

activities.name: Set Orchestrator Type
activities.description: Set the orchestrator type value to a local variable for use in various downstream activities.

activities.name: Switch For Orchestrator Type
activities.description: Switch and handle requests for both Azure Data Factory (ADF) and Azure Synapse Analytics (SYN).

activities.name: Check for Valid ADF Pipeline Name
activities.description: Use the Azure Management API to return and establish if the framework pipeline exists in the target Data Factory instance, including being deployed.

activities.name: Get ADF Pipeline Runs
activities.description: Use the Azure Management API to return a list of data factory pipeline runs within the given time window.

dependsOn.activity: Check for Valid ADF Pipeline Name

activities.name: Set ADF Runs Output
activities.description: Set output to local array for use in downstream filtering and pipeline checks. Use the same array output for both switch cases.

activities.name: Check for Valid SYN Pipeline Name
activities.description:
Use the Azure Management API to return and establish if the framework pipeline exists in the target Synapse instance, including being deployed.

See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/synapse/data-plane/pipeline/getpipeline

activities.name: Get SYN Pipeline Runs
activities.description:
Use the Azure Management API to return a list of synapse pipeline runs within the given time window.

See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/synapse/data-plane/pipelinerun/querypipelinerunsbyworkspace

dependsOn.activity: Check for Valid SYN Pipeline Name

activities.name: Set SYN Runs Output
activities.description: Set output to local array for use in downstream filtering and pipeline checks. Use the same array output for both switch cases.

defaultActivities.name: Throw Exception Invalid Orchestrator Type
defaultActivities.description: Throw exception if switch cases are not met.

parameters.Message: Invalid orchestrator type provided. Unable to check pipeline running state.

activities.name: Set Query Run Days
activities.description: Set the query run days value to a local variable for use in various downstream activities.

properties.description: Used just so the procfwk has something to call during development.

activities.name: Wait1
activities.description: Framework development worker simulator.

activities.name: Raise Errors or Not
activities.description: Framework development worker simulator.

activities.name: Get Worker Pipeline Error Details_copy1
activities.description: Get the activity error details for the run ID of the worker pipeline called. Returns an array of all errors.

properties.description: Interact with the Azure Functions App used as middle ware when making requests to Worker pipelines. Authentication done at the Function App level.
Connection to Key Vault for all other ADF linked service credentials required to run the processing framework.
Connection between ADF and processing framework metadata SQLDB.

activities.name: Wait1
activities.description: Framework development worker simulator.

activities.name: Raise Errors or Not
activities.description: Framework development worker simulator.
